Room.Name: Jungle Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a overgrown path through the jungle near the Uland village.
Room.LongDescription: Not far from here is the village on Uland Island, but this is almost a different world. You are surrounded by thick jungle growth forming a tunnel path through the vegetation. The path generally takes an east to west direction, and to the north you can see a few buildings. In all the other directions, there is nothing but jungle.
